themes: support for first-time and unincorporated applicants
key_phrases: need to be more accessible, equitable, and stable
general operating grants instead of just project-based ones
more flexibility for fiscally sponsored or unincorporated groups
share decision-making power by including diverse, community-rooted panelists and pay them for their time
help artists grow in Austin, not just compete for one-time checks
barriers_identified: lack of support for first-time applicants
exclusion of fiscally sponsored or unincorporated groups
solutions_proposed: increase flexibility for fiscally sponsored or unincorporated groups
include diverse, community-rooted panelists in decision-making
